title: Savages episode 3 - Christians - Thank you Johnny Cash - Truth w
description:
These movies are not the best but it is a very extensive project, spanning many issues that are connected. So please give it some time and thought these are just the first cuts.


This is the third episode in our "Savages the quest foor hegemony" compilation of truths.


This is a companion piece to the "Israel why do they hate us?" epsiode, and the "israel - AIPAC, women and other tales episode.


About the christians that scare me. As christians we try to show how hypocritical the west really is and especially evangelical rightwingers and rightwing ........ sorry need to censor myself. 



Chapters include:


1 God fearing people

2 Kids

3 Racism

4 Christian genocides (against others)

5 Christian rightwing cinema

6 Corporations (well one corporation as an introduction to our next episode)

7 The christian killing machine ( short answers to the dutch racist movie Fitna)

Again peace and prayers from the Netherlands these christians are "we thank god for that" a minority but a powerfull minority that needs to be confronted.


Please help us to spread this series of compilations these are just the first cuts.
